attributes.action: Minister for Men and Male Equality
attributes.additional_details:
Encourage the state to recognise that men suffer domestic abuse & violence by women and to include verbal abuse & parental alienation of the child/children by the other parent in the definition of domestic abuse
Improve men’s health & inequalities in the healthcare system for men
Ensure judges enforce child contact orders
Support move towards equal parenting laws for men
Provide better help and retraining for unemployed men & men returning to work following ill health
Encourage a review of the CSA maintenance criteria where the mother has left her husband for another person, re-married or has walked out of the marriage with the children
Improve care and support for men suffering from depression and mental health illness
Support anonymity for men accused of rape unless deemed to be in the public interest by a Judge or found guilty
Support equal sentencing criteria for men and women
Campaign against anti-male propaganda and male stereotyping in the media & news
